translation.en: All the food's gonna go bad.
translation.es: La comida se va a echar a perder.

translation.en: Yeah, I drew up a list.
I'll hit the store before it gets all bought out.
translation.es: Iré a la tienda antes de que se venda todo.

translation.en: Fuck.
Can you save it? No, no way.
No, I gotta start over from scratch.
translation.es: No. Tendré que volver a empezar.

translation.en: I'll call the studio when the phones get back up,
translation.es: Llamaré al estudio cuando el teléfono funcione…

translation.en: see if they can extend my deadline.
translation.es: …y pediré que posterguen la fecha de entrega.

translation.en: What choice do they have?
Are you kiddin'?
They could whip up some bad Photoshop poster in an afternoon,
translation.es: Pueden hacer un afiche con Photoshop en una tarde.

translation.en: they do it all the time, two big heads.
translation.es: Siempre lo hacen. Dos cabezas gigantes.

translation.en: I should've brought it downstairs with me last night,
translation.es: Debería haberlo llevado cuando bajé anoche.

translation.en: I was just stupid, I guess.
Well, sweetie, you couldn't exactly know that a tree was gonna come flying through the window.
translation.es: Amor, ¿cómo ibas a saber que se metería un árbol por la ventana?

translation.en: Yeah, I'll hit the hardware store too,
translation.es: Sí. Iré a la ferretería también.

translation.en: get some plastic sheeting and duct tape and seal this up before it gets dark, you know.
translation.es: Compraré hule y cinta aisladora para sellar todo antes de que oscurezca.

translation.en: Order in some new glass.
Aw, you know what?
That was your grandfather's tree, the one he planted. Oh!
translation.es: Era el árbol de tu abuelo, el que plantó él.

translation.en: I used to play in that tree.
It's just stuff though.
You know, we're safe, that's all that counts.
translation.es: Nosotros estamos bien. Eso es lo único que importa.

translation.en: Yeah.
Mom, Dad, you gotta come see!
Hey, Billy, take it easy, all right?
I really don't want you running all over the place.
translation.es: No quiero que estés corriendo por todas partes.

translation.en: But you gotta come look!
The boathouse is all bashed. Holy crap!
Billy!
Sorry, Mom, but you just gotta come, come on.
translation.es: Lo siento, mamá, pero tienen que verlo. ¡Vengan!

translation.en: [Billy] Come on!
Having spoken, the Doomsayer departs.
translation.es: Luego de hablar, el fatalista se retira. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: How do you two always manage to make me laugh?
You have incredibly low standards. Mhm.
All right, let's go see the damage.
No!
Norton's tree. Yeah.
You mean the dead one I've been asking him
translation.es: El árbol muerto que hace tres años le pido que corte…

translation.en: to take down for three years before it finally blew over?
translation.es: El árbol muerto que hace tres años le pido que corte… …antes de que se caiga, ¿ese árbol?

translation.en: That tree?
It really got smushed. You ain't kiddin'.
translation.es: - Quedó aplastado. - Y no estás exagerando.

translation.en: Look at that.
[Billy] What is it, Daddy?
Mist?
On the lake? We've had mist on the lake before.
translation.es: - ¿En el lago? - Ya hemos tenido niebla en el lago.

translation.en: Coming off the mountain like that?
Two fronts meeting, leftover from the storm?
translation.es: Dos frentes que se encuentran… …algo que quedó de la tormenta, algo así.

translation.en: Something like that?
translation.es: …algo que quedó de la tormenta, algo así.

translation.en: You sure?
Honey, I'm not the weatherman.
Why don't you take Billy, get him dressed, I'll take him to town with me.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no llevas a Billy y lo vistes? Lo llevaré a la ciudad conmigo.

translation.en: All right. Where you goin'?
I'm gonna go have a little chat with our neighbor about his tree.
translation.es: Voy a conversar con nuestro vecino sobre su árbol.

translation.en: Hon.
Don't worry, I'm not gonna punch him in the nose.
translation.es: Tranquila, no voy a romperle la nariz.

translation.en: You know what he's gonna say.
He's gonna say "Sue me," which, I don't know, maybe we should.
translation.es: Te dirá que lo demandes, y quizás deberíamos hacerlo.

translation.en: Honey, one property dispute with this guy
translation.es: Cariño, un litigio de propiedad con este tipo…

translation.en: is enough to last me a lifetime.
I'm gonna ask for his insurance information.
translation.es: Le pediré los datos de su seguro.

translation.en: Okay.
That's all. Yeah.
[Mr. Norton] Motherfucker!
Aw, shit!
Oh, you motherfucker!
Cock sucker!
Turn on, full choke, pull five choke.
I guess you've seen the...
Boathouse.
Yeah, and?
Nothin'.
Just think we should trade insurance info, you know?
translation.es: Deberíamos intercambiar datos de nuestros seguros.

translation.en: That's all.
Oh, my insurance guy's gonna love me.
translation.es: Mi seguro me va a adorar.

translation.en: I was gonna bring the station wagon, but, I don't know,
the weather was so beautiful coming out of New York,
translation.es: El clima estaba tan hermoso al salir de Nueva York.

translation.en: I just... You know, top down.
I'm sorry, man, I mean it. Sincerely.
That's nice of you to say.
translation.es: - Gracias por decirlo. - No. Ese auto era hermoso.

translation.en: No, that car was cherry, I hate to see it like that.
translation.es: - Gracias por decirlo. - No. Ese auto era hermoso. Me mata verlo así.

translation.en: Okay, I'll tell you what.
I'll find my insurance guy's number, I'll bring it by later.
translation.es: Buscaré el número del seguro y te lo llevaré más tarde.

translation.en: Is that okay? No problem.
So, David.
You're not heading into town today by any chance, are you?
translation.es: ¿Por casualidad, irás a la ciudad hoy?

translation.en: [David] Well, CMP's out in force.
translation.es: La empresa de energía está trabajando.

translation.en: Maybe we'll get our power back.
[Mr. Norton] That was some storm, huh?
One for the books, yeah.
For a moment there last night
I thought we were gonna take off and head for Oz.
translation.es: …que saldríamos volando a la tierra de Oz.

translation.en: WZON is off the air,
translation.es: WZON no está en el aire…

translation.en: but Portland's still broadcasting.
Daddy, look!
Guys from the base.
From up the mountain?
The Arrowhead Project?
Well, you're a local. Any idea what they do up there?
translation.es: Tú eres de aquí. ¿Tienes idea qué hacen allí?

translation.en: Missile defense research, you know,
I'm sure you've heard the stories.
Oh, sure. The woman at the laundromat says that
translation.es: Sí, claro, la mujer del lavadero…

translation.en: they have a crashed flying saucer up there with frozen alien bodies.
translation.es: …dice que tienen una nave espacial con marcianos congelados.

translation.en: Right, Miss Edna, yeah.
Miss Tabloid.
"I Had Bigfoot's Baby".
translation.es: "Tuve un bebé con el Hombre de las Nieves".

translation.en: "Satan's Face Appears in Oil Well Fire".
translation.es: "Aparece el rostro del diablo en incendio en pozo de petróleo".

translation.en: You know, real reliable stuff.
translation.es: "Aparece el rostro del diablo en incendio en pozo de petróleo". Material muy confiable.

translation.en: [David] Oh, they're in a hurry.
Maybe their power's out too.
Ah, still no signal.
Why don't you go ahead? I'm gonna try Steph on the payphone.
translation.es: Adelántate. Llamaré a Steph desde un teléfono público.

translation.en: [Billy] Can I go with Mr. Norton, Daddy?
translation.es: ¿Puedo ir con el señor Norton, papá?

translation.en: Sure, if you promise to hold his hand, I guess.
translation.es: Claro. Si prometes ir de la mano.

translation.en: [Billy] Yeah?
Yeah. Here's a list.
-Okay. -Okay?
Meet you guys in there.
Hold hands.
Sally, hey. [Sally] Hey, Mr. Drayton.
You guys look jammed up.
Yeah, well, half the staff didn't show, plus the power's out.
translation.es: Sí. La mitad de los empleados no vino y no hay electricidad.

translation.en: Oh, no. What, no backup generator?
translation.es: Oh, no. ¿No hay un generador de emergencia?

translation.en: Only to keep the food cold.
Everything else, welcome to the Dark Ages
translation.es: Para todo lo demás, bienvenido a la Edad Media…

translation.en: and bring your checkbook.
Hey, Thursday night, Steph and I wanna date night.
translation.es: El jueves por la noche Steph y yo queremos salir.

translation.en: Babysit? Heck yeah, I'm there.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes cuidar a Billy? - Claro que sí. Allí estaré.

translation.en: [David] Oh my God.
[Ollie] The storm.
Everybody's stocking up, been like this since we opened.
translation.es: Todos se están aprovisionando. Ha estado así desde que abrimos.

translation.en: Crappy day, huh?
Eh, everyone's a little pissed off this morning.
translation.es: Todos están un poco molestos hoy.

translation.en: Morning, Mrs. Carmody.
[Mrs. Carmody] With lines like these, I don't know how good it is,
translation.es: Con filas así, no sé si es bueno…

translation.en: but I guess we'll have to make do.
Keep your head down, pal. I know it.
Hey, champ.
Your wife should be a doctor.
She could make a fortune in Manhattan with this handwriting.
translation.es: Podría ganar una fortuna en Manhattan con esta letra.

translation.en: Yeah, it takes some getting used to.
Why don't you get your stuff? I'll meet you at the checkout.
translation.es: Ve por tus cosas. Nos veremos en las cajas.

translation.en: Okay, done.
Hey, David. Thanks for helping me out today.
[Billy] Are you and Mr. Norto gonna be friends now, Daddy?
translation.es: ¿El señor Norton y tú serán amigos ahora, papá?

translation.en: Oh, I don't know.
Friends might be stretching it a little.
Guess you're not mad at each other anymore.
I guess not.
Hey, and that's a start, eh?
[Man] I'm sorry, ma'am, the register's down.
translation.es: La mayor tormenta eléctrica… Lo siento. Las cajas no funcionan. El corte de energía nos afectó también.

translation.en: The power outage got us too.
translation.es: Lo siento. Las cajas no funcionan. El corte de energía nos afectó también.

translation.en: Hopefully we'll have power up pretty soon.
[Officer Jessup] The bus leaves in 30 minutes. We'll make it, okay?
translation.es: - El autobús sale en 30 minutos. - Hay tiempo.

translation.en: You guys get the goodies, I'll wait in line.
translation.es: Ustedes vayan a buscar las cosas. Yo esperaré en la fila.

translation.en: [Man] I need some change on register 5.
translation.es: Necesito cambio en la caja cinco.

translation.en: [Jessup] Good morning, Ms. Reppler.
[Billy] Hello, Ms. Reppler.
Well, hello to you, Billy Drayton.
How'd you hold up in the storm?
We had a tree come through the picture window last night, right in my studio.
translation.es: Anoche un árbol rompió un ventanal justo en mi estudio.

translation.en: And the boathouse got all smushed. Mr. Norton's tree fell on it.
translation.es: El cobertizo se destruyó. El árbol del señor Norton cayó encima.

translation.en: [Irene] Oh, ouch.
translation.es: El cobertizo se destruyó. El árbol del señor Norton cayó encima. - Sí. - Qué pena me da.

translation.en: Sorry to hear that.
[David] Well, how'd you guys make out?
[Hattie] Oh, we're fine. It's the listings I'm worried about.
translation.es: Estamos bien. Mi preocupación son los precios.

translation.en: At the very least, I'll bet every one of our "For Sale" signs fell over.
translation.es: Se cayeron todos nuestros carteles de oferta.

translation.en: [Irene] We had damage at the school, wouldn't you know?
That's what we get for not fixing that roof when we should've.
translation.es: Eso es lo que pasa por no arreglar el techo a tiempo.

translation.en: But with funds being cut every year,
translation.es: Pero con los recortes de gastos todos los años…

translation.en: you'd think educating children
translation.es: Uno pensaría que la educación de los niños…

translation.en: would be more of a priority in this country,
translation.es: …debería de ser una prioridad en este país…

translation.en: but you'd be wrong.
Government's got better things to spend our money on,
translation.es: El gobierno tiene mejores cosas en las que gastar nuestro dinero…

translation.en: like corporate handouts and building bombs.
translation.es: …como dádivas a empresas y la construcción de bombas.

translation.en: Daddy, is there a fire? Is Mommy all right?
I'm sure she's fine. Don't worry, okay?
translation.es: Seguro que está bien. No te preocupes.

translation.en: [Bud] Mind what you're doing, Sally.
[Donaldson] Oh, come on, we'v got 10 days leave. Check our papers.
translation.es: Tenemos un permiso de 10 días. Controle nuestros papeles.

translation.en: [M.P. Officer] Look, I told you all leaves are canceled.
translation.es: Ya les dije. Los permisos han sido cancelados.

translation.en: I don't know why.
I gotta go check the pharmacy out.
You men meet me back at the jeep in 5 minutes.
translation.es: Necesito tres hombres conmigo en el Jeep en cinco minutos.

translation.en: That's an order.
[Morales] Shit, man. Another half an hour, we'd of been gone.
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea! Media hora más y nos hubiéramos ido.

translation.en: Oh my God.
[Dan] Something in the mist!
Something in the mist took John Lee!
translation.es: ¡Algo en la niebla… se llevó a John Lee!

translation.en: Dan, catch your breath!
Something in the mist took John Lee.
translation.es: Algo en la niebla se llevó a John Lee.

translation.en: I could hear him screaming.
Shut the doors! Shut the doors, my God!
[Billy] Daddy, I'm scared. Can we go home?
[Dan] Don't go out there.
There's something in the mist, it took John Lee!
translation.es: Hay algo en la niebla. Se llevó a John Lee.

translation.en: [Man] Screw that, I'm getting in my car.
translation.es: ¿Qué me importa? Me voy a mi auto.

translation.en: [Dan] Mister, no!
Please hold me.
It's okay, it's okay.
[Ambrose] It's a pollution cloud, from the mills, down in Rumsford.
translation.es: Es una nube de contaminación por las fábricas de Rumford.

translation.en: Some kind of chemical explosion, has to be.
translation.es: Debe ser algún tipo de explosión química.

translation.en: [Ollie] What is it?
What's going on?
It's death.
[Billy] Daddy!
[Mike] That was an earthquake.
[Ambrose] I tell ya, the goddamn mills blew up!
Is everyone okay? Is anyone hurt?
Everybody just stay put, okay? Just stay inside the store.
translation.es: Quédense todos donde están. Quédense dentro de la tienda.

translation.en: I can't. I can't stay here, I gotta get home to my kids.
translation.es: No puedo quedarme. Debo volver a casa con mis hijos.

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] No, no, don't go out there.
It's death out there. It's the end of days.
translation.es: La muerte está afuera. Es el fin del mundo.

translation.en: Stop it, okay?
translation.es: La muerte está afuera. Es el fin del mundo. Ya basta, ¿sí? Basta.

translation.en: Stop it.
Please, everybody, everybody just relax.
Let's just stay cool,
let's just try to figure out what happened.
I'm sorry. I can't just stay here, I have to get home to my kids.
translation.es: Lo siento. No puedo quedarme aquí. Debo ir a casa con mis hijos.

translation.en: [Dan] Ma'am, no, you can't go out there.
That could be a poisonous gas cloud.
translation.es: Podría ser una nube de gas tóxico.

translation.en: Didn't you hear that man screaming?
translation.es: ¿No oyó los gritos de ese hombre?

translation.en: I agree, let's stay here until we figure it out.
translation.es: Sí, quedémonos aquí hasta que sepamos qué es.

translation.en: You're not listening!
I can't stay here.
Wanda's looking after little Victor, she's only 8.
translation.es: Wanda se quedó con el pequeño Víctor y ella sólo tiene 8 años.

translation.en: Sometimes she forgets she's supposed to be watching him, you know?
translation.es: A veces se olvida de que tiene que cuidarlo.

translation.en: I told them I'd only be gone a few minutes.
She's only 8!
For their sakes, don't.
translation.es: Por el bien de sus hijos, no lo haga.

translation.en: Well, is anybody gonna help me?
Won't somebody here see a lady home?
translation.es: ¿Nadie acompañará a una dama a su casa?

translation.en: You?
You?
It's okay, buddy. You?
Ma'am, please. I got my own boy to worry about.
translation.es: Señora, por favor, tengo que ocuparme de mi propio niño.

translation.en: I hope you all rot in hell.
translation.es: Espero que todos se pudran en el infierno.

translation.en: [Ollie] Ma'am, please, wait until...
translation.es: - Señora, por favor, espere hasta… - Suélteme.

translation.en: [Bud] Okay, let's start cleaning up, okay?
Get the spilled bottles, broken glass, stuff like that.
translation.es: Limpien las botellas derramadas, vidrios rotos, ese tipo de cosas.

translation.en: Aisle 3 has medical supplies.
translation.es: En la góndola tres hay suministros médicos.

translation.en: Okay, okay, it's okay.
Easy champ, come on.
All right, hey, hey, hey.
You can't keep crying like this, pal.
translation.es: No puedes seguir llorando así, hijo.

translation.en: Come on.
You're gonna hurt yourself.
translation.es: Vamos, te va a hacer mal.

translation.en: Come on, you all right? I want Mommy.
All right, I know you do. Okay.
translation.es: Ya sé que quieres ir con tu mamá.

translation.en: Just try to breathe, okay?
translation.es: Está bien, tratemos de respirar. Tratemos de respirar, ¿sí?

translation.en: Just try to breathe, pal, it's okay.
It's all right.
I haven't seen him suck his thumb like this since he was two years old.
translation.es: No lo había visto chuparse el dedo desde los dos años.

translation.en: He's in shock. I think we all are.
translation.es: Está conmocionado. Creo que todos lo estamos.

translation.en: You haven't met.
She's new in town as of this semester.
translation.es: Llegó a la ciudad este semestre.

translation.en: Teaches 3rd grade, and the special ed kids
translation.es: Es maestra de tercer grado… …y de educación especial ahora que Mosher se jubiló.

translation.en: now that Mosher's retired.
translation.es: …y de educación especial ahora que Mosher se jubiló.

translation.en: She's wonderful, the kids love her.
translation.es: Es fantástica. Los niños la adoran.

translation.en: And David's an artist, he does movie posters and such.
translation.es: David es artista. Hace afiches para películas y cosas así.

translation.en: Oh, and me.
Lord, I'm babbling away like some old biddy at a tea party.
translation.es: Por Dios, estoy hablando sin parar como una vieja en una reunión de té.

translation.en: My nerves are jangled, I guess.
translation.es: Debe de ser por los nervios.

translation.en: Boy settle down?
How is he?
Still hot.
[Amanda] Why don't I get him some aspirin?
Aisle 3.
Okay. Thanks.
How's Dan?
Ah, his nose stopped bleeding.
He's calmer now, somebody gave him a Valium.
translation.es: Ahora está más tranquilo. Alguien le dio un Valium.

translation.en: I can't believe the way he ran in here.
translation.es: No puedo creer cómo llegó corriendo.

translation.en: Never seen him like that.
I need something to cover my boy up. You got any blankets?
translation.es: Necesito algo para tapar a mi hijo. ¿Tienen frazadas?

translation.en: Furniture pads, loading dock.
translation.es: Fundas para muebles. En el depósito.

translation.en: Gonna keep checking on people, if you need anything, just holler.
translation.es: Iré a ver cómo están los demás. Si necesitan algo, llámenme.

translation.en: You bet. Sally, you mind?
Oh, I'd love to. I really should help him clean up.
translation.es: Me encantaría pero debería ayudar a limpiar.

translation.en: I'll take him.
-Okay. -Daddy, don't go!
translation.es: - Yo lo haré. - Está bien. Papá, no te vayas.

translation.en: No, I'll be gone two seconds, Big Bill. Come on, I'm gonna get your blanket.
translation.es: No. Es sólo un minuto, Bill. Iré a buscarte una frazada.

translation.en: Mrs. Reppler's here, and so is Mrs. Turman.
translation.es: La señora Reppler está aquí… …y también la señora Turman.

translation.en: I'll be close by, okay?
Don't worry, I'm not far. Okay?
translation.es: - Está bien. - No te preocupes. No estaré lejos.

translation.en: Let me look at you.
[Hattie] Wanna lie Down? Yeah.
There you go.
[Nortan] As soon as it blows away we can walk out of here safe and free,
translation.es: En cuanto se disipe, saldremos sanos y salvos…

translation.en: but we have to be smarter.
The first thing we need to do is keep our wits about us
translation.es: Lo primero que tenemos que hacer es mantener la mente fría…

translation.en: and find out what's happening.
[Biker] Well, how we gonna do that, my man?
translation.es: ¿Y cómo vamos a hacer eso, amigo?

translation.en: We've got no phone signal, we've got no radio.
translation.es: No tenemos teléfono, no tenemos radio.

translation.en: [Nortan] I'm sure they're working on those problems as we speak.
translation.es: Deben estar solucionando esos problemas en este momento.

translation.en: It stands to reason that restoring communications
translation.es: Lo más lógico es pensar… …que restablecer las comunicaciones será la prioridad.

translation.en: would be their top priority.
translation.es: …que restablecer las comunicaciones será la prioridad.

translation.en: [David] Oh, shit.
Shit!
God damn it!
Bitch!
[Nortan] It's obvious that we're in some kind of natural disaster here.
translation.es: Es obvio que estamos frente a un desastre natural.

translation.en: [Biker] Ain't nothing obvious bout this sombitch from where I sit.
translation.es: Para mí, nada sobre esta mierda es obvio.

translation.en: [Ambrose] There ain't nothing natural about it either.
translation.es: - No tiene nada de natural tampoco. - Es cierto.

translation.en: [Biker] That's right.
translation.es: - No tiene nada de natural tampoco. - Es cierto. Es el Día del Juicio Final.

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] It's Judgment Day, and it's come round at last.
translation.es: Es el Día del Juicio Final.

translation.en: There is nothing more obvious or natural than that.
translation.es: No hay nada más obvio ni natural que eso.

translation.en: [Biker] Aw, fuck now.
You've done that to yourself
by a life of sin and disillusion.
translation.es: …llevando una vida de pecado y libertinaje.

translation.en: Hey, whoa!
Hey, you guys hear that?
The generator? We're just gonna check it out.
No, no, I turned the generator off,
translation.es: No, no, yo lo apagué. No estaba funcionando bien.

translation.en: it was backing up.
Nobody else heard that sound? What sound?
I don't know, like a weird noise,
back there in the dark.
Like something was pressing against the door.
translation.es: Era como si algo estuviera empujando la puerta.

translation.en: Did you hear it before the lights went out or after?
translation.es: ¿Lo oíste antes o después de que se apagaran las luces?

translation.en: No, only after.
After, but look, I heard it, okay?
Nobody's calling you a liar. That's what it sounds like.
translation.es: - Nadie te llamó mentiroso. - Bueno, eso parece.

translation.en: [Jim] No, no, no, no, now don't be that way, Mr. Drayton.
translation.es: No, no, no, no. Se equivoca, señor Drayton.

translation.en: [Jim] You had a scare, no doubt.
Let's say we all go check it out. Here.
translation.es: ¿Qué le parece si vamos nosotros a revisarlo? Tenga.

translation.en: Man.
It's pretty rank in here.
Myron, go check it out. [Myron] All right.
[Jim] Go on, fire it up.
All right, turn it off!
[Myron] Holy crow, don't that stink.
Something's got the exhaust vent plugged up from the outside.
translation.es: Algo en la ventilación la está tapando desde afuera.

translation.en: [Norm] You get it running long enough to raise that door a little,
translation.es: Manténganlo encendido para subir un poco esa puerta.

translation.en: I'll go out and clear whatever's blocking it.
translation.es: Yo saldré y quitaré lo que esté atascado.

translation.en: [David] No, no, you can't do that.
translation.es: No, no, no puedes hacer eso.

translation.en: [Jim] Why not? It's an electric door, right?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no? ¿No es una puerta eléctrica?

translation.en: [Ollie] Well, yeah, but it may not be wise to send him out there.
translation.es: Sí, pero tal vez no sea conveniente que él salga.

translation.en: [Myron] Okay, I'll do it.
No, look, it's not about who goes out there-
translation.es: No, no se trata de quién sale.

translation.en: [Myron] What, don't you think I can do it?
translation.es: No, no se trata de quién sale. ¿Piensa que no puedo hacerlo?

translation.en: -[Norm] Hey, I want to go, it was my idea.
translation.es: Oigan, yo quiero ir. Fue mi idea.

translation.en: [David] Whoa, wait, wait, just stop, okay?
Jim, right?
Myron? You guys are...
Well, you don't seem to understand, or you're trying real hard not to.
translation.es: Bueno, parece que no entienden, o no quieren entender.

translation.en: This isn't an ordinary mist, okay?
You open that door and something gets in here-
translation.es: Cuando abran la puerta, algo va a entrar aquí.

translation.en: Like what?
Well, like whatever made that noise I heard.
translation.es: Como lo que sea que hizo el ruido que oí.

translation.en: Are you guys being willfully dense?
translation.es: ¿Se están haciendo los tontos a propósito?

translation.en: Mr. Drayton, you know, pardon me,
but I'm not convinced that you heard anything.
translation.es: …pero no estoy seguro de que haya oído algo.

translation.en: I mean, we're not hearing anything now, right? Anybody?
translation.es: Ahora no se oye nada. ¿Alguien oye algo?

translation.en: See?
Now, I know, I know, you're a big shot artist
translation.es: Lo sé, lo sé, usted es un artista importante…

translation.en: with connections in New York and Hollywood and all that,
translation.es: …con contactos en Nueva York y Hollywood y todo eso…

translation.en: but that don't make you better than anybody else, not in my book.
translation.es: …pero eso no lo hace mejor que otros, al menos en mi opinión.

translation.en: Hey, I didn't say that.
[Jim] Nor do I like being talked down to
translation.es: Oiga, yo no dije eso. Tampoco me gusta que un tipo que fue a la universidad…

translation.en: or called stupid by a guy who went to college
translation.es: Tampoco me gusta que un tipo que fue a la universidad… …me haga callar o me diga estúpido sólo porque está nervioso.

translation.en: just 'cause he's got the jitters.
translation.es: …me haga callar o me diga estúpido sólo porque está nervioso.

translation.en: Fellas, it doesn't even matter about the generator, the food will keep without it.
translation.es: Muchachos, no importa el generador. La comida se conservará igualmente.

translation.en: [Jim] Kid, I'm gonna start th motor, you raise the door,
translation.es: Hijo, voy a encender el motor, tú levantas la puerta…

translation.en: and you yell out when you got enough room.
translation.es: …y me gritas cuando tengas suficiente espacio.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, good.
Wait!
You guys are gonna let this kid risk his life
translation.es: ¿Van a permitir que este chico arriesgue su vida…

translation.en: over a generator that doesn't even matter?
translation.es: …por un generador que ni siquiera hace falta?

translation.en: Would you just shut the fuck up already?
translation.es: ¿Puede cerrar la boca de una vez?

translation.en: [Ollie] Norm!
[Jim] Listen, Mr. Drayton, I tell you what.
translation.es: Escuche, señor Drayton, le diré algo.

translation.en: The next time you got something to say,
translation.es: La próxima vez que tenga algo que decir…

translation.en: you count your teeth. Because I'm sick to death of your bullshit.
translation.es: …cuente hasta diez porque estoy harto de sus tonterías.

translation.en: All right?
Come on, Myron.
[Ollie] Leave 'em be.
What am I, impugning their manhood or something?
translation.es: ¿Estoy insultando su hombría o algo así?

translation.en: Listen, they've lost their sense of proportion.
translation.es: Han perdido el sentido de la seriedad del asunto.

translation.en: What's going on here?
Out there in the market they were scared and confused,
translation.es: En el mercado, estaban asustados y confundidos.

translation.en: in here there's a problem they can solve.
translation.es: Aquí hay un problema que pueden resolver…

translation.en: So, they're goddamn gonna solve it.
Let's rock!
Norm, come on. Don't, man.
translation.es: Norm, vamos. No lo hagas, viejo.

translation.en: It's a mistake.
Pussy.
Hold up!
So, any boogeyman?
[Jim] Pretty scary, ain't it, Norm?
Yeah, right.
Norm!
What the fuck?
Get it off, get it off!
Get this friggin' thing off me!
Get it off!
Help me, help me, help me!
There's more, there's more!
Somebody help me.
Somebody help me. What the fuck are you waiting for?
translation.es: Alguien que me ayude. ¿Qué demonios esperan?

translation.en: Hang on!
[Ollie] Hold him still! Hold him still!
[Jim] Oh, Jesus...
Shit, oh shit!
[Jim] Oh shit!
[Ollie] Dave, it's no good!
[David] Start the generator!
Hey, I'm sorry.
But how the hell was I supposed to know what you meant?
translation.es: ¿Cómo… cómo diablos iba a saber a qué se refería?

translation.en: You said you heard something.
How was I supposed to know what you meant? You should've said what you meant better.
translation.es: ¿Cómo iba a saber a qué se refería? Debería haberse explicado mejor.

translation.en: I don't know, I thought maybe it was a big bird or something.
translation.es: No sé, pensé que tal vez era un pájaro grande o algo así.

translation.en: You got that kid killed.
Did you get a good look at it, huh?
Did you get a good look at what you did?
translation.es: ¿Te das cuenta de lo que hiciste?

translation.en: Huh?
[Ollie] David! Don't hit him anymore! -And you too! -It doesn't solve anything.
Assholes! You got that kid killed,
translation.es: ¡Ustedes dos, imbéciles, mataron a ese chico!

translation.en: and I got his fucking blood on me!
translation.es: ¡Y yo estoy manchado con su sangre!

translation.en: Okay, I'm done.
Okay.
What's next?
Kill the generator.
That's the first thing.
[Jim] I'm sorry.
Jesus Christ, oh God.
I'm sorry about the kid.
Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
We oughta get outta here.
Hey man, we didn't twist this on him.
Yeah, he's a fuckin' kid. He's supposed to be stupid.
translation.es: Sí, es un chico. Se supone que es estúpido.

translation.en: What's your excuse, huh?
Get outta here.
Go back in the market, stay by the door.
translation.es: Vuelvan al mercado. Quédense junto a la puerta.

translation.en: Don't say anything to anybody.
Not yet.
Not yet.
[Ollie] Shit.
[Ollie] David? Need a little light here.
translation.es: David, necesito un poco de luz aquí.

translation.en: We have to tell 'em.
The people in the market, we have to stop them from going outside.
translation.es: La gente que está en el mercado, tenemos que evitar que salgan.

translation.en: [David] They won't believe us.
They have to.
I'm not sure I believe it, I was here.
translation.es: Yo no estoy seguro de creerlo y estaba aquí.

translation.en: What we saw was impossible.
You know that, don't you?
I mean, what do we say?
How do we convince them?
Ollie, what the hell were those tentacles even attached to?
translation.es: Ollie, ¿de qué criatura salían esos tentáculos?

translation.en: Oh my god. Are you all right?
Shh, shh, shh. Yeah, yeah, yeah, it's not my blood, I'm fine.
translation.es: Sí, sí, sí, no es sangre mía. Estoy bien.

translation.en: What the hell happened?
Give me a minute, okay?
I need to deal with something first.
Please, I've got to...
I can't let Billy see me like this, he's scared enough.
translation.es: No puedo dejar que Billy me vea así. Ya está asustado.

translation.en: Just give me a minute, keep him distracted. Okay?
Okay.
[jim] Hey, look. I'm sorry about Norm. [Ollie] Me too.
translation.es: - Oiga, siento lo de Norm. - Yo también.

translation.en: I mean, I ain't making excuses, I'm just saying.
translation.es: No estoy justificándome, sólo quiero decirlo.

translation.en: Look, we need to tell people.
We don't need to say how it went down
translation.es: No es necesario decir cómo pasó ni nada de eso…

translation.en: or anything like that, but we're in the deep shit here,
translation.es: No es necesario decir cómo pasó ni nada de eso… …pero… tenemos un problema serio.

translation.en: people need to know.
[Myron] What about the out of towners?
We've got plenty of them in the store. Where do we even start?
translation.es: Hay muchos en la tienda. ¿Por dónde empezamos?

translation.en: Brent Norton? [Jim] That windbag?
He's an important attorney in New York.
translation.es: Es un abogado importante de Nueva York.

translation.en: That fella could be on the bench one day.
translation.es: Puede llegar a ser juez algún día.

translation.en: Counts a lot for people in this town, or anywhere.
translation.es: Influye mucho en la gente de aquí… y de todos lados.

translation.en: Do it quick, David.
translation.es: - Sí, es cierto. - Hazlo rápido, David.

translation.en: We've gotta discuss how we're gonna stop that thing getting in here.
translation.es: Tenemos que ver cómo evitar que esa cosa se meta aquí.

translation.en: Wait, what do you mean getting in?
You shut the loading door.
Yeah, but the entire front of the store is plate glass.
translation.es: Sí, pero todo el frente de la tienda es de vidrio.

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
Um, listen.
That guy who came in here with the bloody nose.
translation.es: …ese tipo que entró, que le sangraba la nariz…

translation.en: They're, they're... We saw tentacles.
It ain't going very well, is it?
You, what? Come here.
Come here.
Tell him.
It's true.
Tentacles. Yeah.
Um, gentlemen, I'm sorry,
I'm just not that stupid.
translation.es: Lo siento, no soy tan estúpido.

translation.en: I mean, what do you take me for? I'm shocked.
I'm shocked.
I'm shocked, it's pretty tasteless
translation.es: Me sorprende. Me sorprende. Es de mal gusto que aprovechen…

translation.en: using what's happening here to try to make me look like an idiot.
translation.es: …lo que está sucediendo para hacerme parecer un imbécil.

translation.en: No, no, no, that's not what's going on here. Look, come back to the loading dock, okay?
translation.es: No, no, no es eso lo que pasa. Ven al depósito, ¿quieres?

translation.en: I'll show you.
Blood, and a chuck of tentacle on the floor.
translation.es: Sangre. Un trozo de tentáculo en… en el piso.

translation.en: No, what do you mean no? Uh, no.
We've got real problems to deal with here,
translation.es: No. Aquí tenemos problemas reales que resolver…

translation.en: and this pathetic attempt at a joke has gone far enough.
translation.es: …y este ridículo intento de broma ha llegado demasiado lejos.

translation.en: Mr. Norton.
translation.es: …y este ridículo intento de broma ha llegado demasiado lejos. Señor Norton, ¿qué razón podríamos tener…?

translation.en: What reason could we possibly have-
Oh, please, please!
This is payback for the lawsuit that I filed against him last year,
translation.es: Es una venganza por la demanda que presenté en su contra el año pasado…

translation.en: and you guys are backing him up.
So, winning wasn't enough, huh? You wanted to humiliate me some more.
translation.es: Así que ganar no fue suficiente. Querías humillarme un poco más.

translation.en: Show me a rubber snake while these hicks
translation.es: Mostrarme una serpiente de goma mientras estos campesinos…

translation.en: stand around laughing their asses off.
Watch who you're calling a hick. Myron, Myron, Myron!
Hey, hey, fuck- Mr. Norton, I swear.
You've got us all wrong.
You're not too crazy about out of towners, are ya?
I only spend my money and I pay my taxes here,
translation.es: Sólo gasto dinero y pago mis cuentas aquí…

translation.en: and I've seen you talking behind my back.
translation.es: Sólo gasto dinero y pago mis cuentas aquí… …y te he visto a ti hablando a mis espaldas.

translation.en: How y'all stick together?
Well, don't I feel foolish?
I actually thought you were being kind to me today.
translation.es: En serio pensé que estabas siendo amable conmigo hoy.

translation.en: Well, thanks for setting me straight.
And I'm glad that tree fell on your boathouse, you know that?
translation.es: Y me alegra que se haya caído ese árbol sobre tu bote.

translation.en: Glad. Smashed it in pretty good, didn't it?
translation.es: Me alegra. Lo golpeó mucho, ¿no? Genial.

translation.en: Fantastic.
translation.es: Me alegra. Lo golpeó mucho, ¿no? Genial. Ahora, déjenme en paz.

translation.en: Now all of y'all, just stay out of my way-
I know you're scared, man. I'm scared too.
translation.es: Sé que tienes miedo, viejo. Yo también tengo miedo.

translation.en: Lives are at stake around here.
translation.es: - Hay vidas en juego aquí. - David…

translation.en: -David, I- -Okay, my son's life.
translation.es: - Hay vidas en juego aquí. - David… La vida de mi hijo. Te necesito a ti.

translation.en: Now, I need you.
translation.es: La vida de mi hijo. Te necesito a ti.

translation.en: Brent, please, get your head out of your ass.
translation.es: Brent, por favor, abre los ojos.

translation.en: All right? I'll drag you back there if I have to.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Te arrastraré hasta allá atrás si es necesario.

translation.en: Come here.
-David, get your- -No, I need- Get your God damn hands off of me!
translation.es: ¡David, quítame tus malditas manos de encima!

translation.en: I'll sue your ass again! Sue your ass!
And this time you'll go to jail.
translation.es: ¡Te demandaré y esta vez irás a la cárcel!

translation.en: This man assaulted me.
He assaulted me. You were witness to it.
This man's crazy, he's crazy.
He isn't. I wish he was, but he isn't.
translation.es: No está loco. Ojalá lo estuviera, pero no.

translation.en: Everyone in the store. You want to come back here?
There's something that you need to hear,
translation.es: Hay algo que deben escuchar. Les atañe a todos.

translation.en: it concerns you all.
translation.es: Hay algo que deben escuchar. Les atañe a todos. Bien.

translation.en: Okay?
[Bud] Wait, wait, wait, wait. I don't know what you people think you're doing.
translation.es: Esperen. No sé qué creen que están haciendo.

translation.en: You drinking?
For Christ's sake, Ollie.
translation.es: Por el amor de Dios, Ollie.

translation.en: Do you want me to report you? You want to lose your job?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que te denuncie? ¿Quieres perder tu trabajo?

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna be taking down names, starting with you.
translation.es: Tomaré nota de los nombres, empezando por el tuyo.

translation.en: And I am prepared to file a police report.
translation.es: Y estoy listo para denunciarlos a la policía.

translation.en: Fine, Bud, write down your names.
translation.es: - Está bien, Bud, toma nota. - Por supuesto.

translation.en: I will.
translation.es: - Está bien, Bud, toma nota. - Por supuesto. Pero mientras tanto, cierra la boca y escucha.

translation.en: And in the meantime, shut the fuck up and listen.
translation.es: Pero mientras tanto, cierra la boca y escucha.

translation.en: This is Mr. David Drayton.
translation.es: Éste es el señor David Drayton.

translation.en: You need to hear what he's got to say if you're thinking about leaving.
translation.es: Deben oír lo que dirá si están pensando en irse.

translation.en: Go hang out with the ladies, all right?
Listen, don't be scared.
It's okay.
Okay. This is how it is.
translation.es: Bien. Esto es lo que pasa.

translation.en: Now, I don't know what this mist is,
translation.es: No sé qué es esa niebla…

translation.en: but there are things in it, and they're dangerous, like Dan said.
translation.es: …pero hay cosas en ella, y son peligrosas, como dijo Dan.

translation.en: [Dan] That's right.
That's exactly right.
[Mike] What kinda things?
I never saw it, it happened too fast.
translation.es: Nunca las vi. Sucedió demasiado rápido.

translation.en: I got knocked down.
Five us went back in the loading dock.
It was Jim, Myron, Ollie, me,
Norm, the bag boy.
And we opened the door-
Where's Norm?
translation.es: - Abrimos la puerta… - ¿Dónde está Norm? …para que Norm saliera y limpiara la ventilación del generador.

translation.en: So Norm could go out and clear the vent for the generator.
translation.es: …para que Norm saliera y limpiara la ventilación del generador.

translation.en: Something came out of the mist and took him. Took him?
translation.es: - Algo salió de la niebla y lo tomó. - ¿Lo tomó?

translation.en: What do you mean?
Just killed him. I mean, dragged him off.
Now, guys, I don't know what these things are.
translation.es: Lo mató. Lo arrastró. No sé qué son esas cosas.

translation.en: All we saw were tentacles.
translation.es: Lo único que vimos fue unos tentáculos.

translation.en: [Woman] Tentacles?
Tentacles, he says.
Tentacles from Planet X.
No, it's a lie, you know.
All these people do is just lie each other up.
translation.es: Todo lo que están haciendo es mentir.

translation.en: It's a pile of shit.
Of course it's a lie, of course it's a lie,
translation.es: Son tonterías. Por supuesto que es mentira. Es una locura.

translation.en: it's lunacy!
translation.es: Por supuesto que es mentira. Es una locura.

translation.en: And from the look of it, the tentacles are coming out of the beer cans.
translation.es: Parece que los tentáculos están saliendo de las latas de cerveza.

translation.en: All right, Bud, don't take our word for it.
translation.es: Está bien, Bud, no nos creas a nosotros.

translation.en: Go look.
What the hell is that?
It appears we may have a problem of some magnitude here.
translation.es: Al parecer podríamos tener un problema bastante grave.

translation.en: Let me...
Help these people.
Let me preach your word.
Let me shine your light.
'Cause they're not all bad.
They can't all be bad.
Some can be saved, can't they?
Yes, some can be brought to heaven's holy gates
translation.es: Sí. Por tu gracia, algunos llegarán a las puertas del cielo.

translation.en: through your grace.
translation.es: Por tu gracia, algunos llegarán a las puertas del cielo.

translation.en: I have to believe that,
though I know most people swim in a lake of fire forever.
translation.es: …aunque sé que la mayoría nadará en el lago de azufre para siempre.

translation.en: If I can save a few, even one,
then my life will have counted for something.
I will have pulled my weight,
I will have earned my place at your side,
translation.es: Me habré ganado mi lugar a Tu lado.

translation.en: I will have served a purpose here on this earth.
translation.es: Habré servido de algo en esta tierra.

translation.en: Hello?
What?
I just need to use the bathroom.
Okay, well then, have at it.
Ma'am, I just want you to know that it's okay,
translation.es: Señora… …sólo quiero decirle que está bien… sentir miedo.

translation.en: being scared, I mean.
translation.es: …sólo quiero decirle que está bien… sentir miedo.

translation.en: And, well, if you need a friend, you know, someone to talk to-
translation.es: Y si necesita una amiga… o alguien con quien hablar…

translation.en: I have a friend, God up above.
translation.es: Yo tengo un amigo. Dios en el Cielo, y hablo con Él todos los días.

translation.en: I talk to him every day.
translation.es: Dios en el Cielo, y hablo con Él todos los días.

translation.en: Don't you condescend me.
I'm sorry?
Not ever. You don't mock me.
translation.es: Jamás. No se burle de mí.

translation.en: That's not what I was doing.
Look, I tell you what.
The day I need a friend like you,
translation.es: …el día que necesite una amiga como usted…

translation.en: I'll just have myself a little squat and shit one out.
translation.es: …me pondré en cuclillas y defecaré una.

translation.en: Maybe you do believe this,
maybe they're not lies, they're delusions, whatever.
translation.es: Quizás no sean mentiras, sino delirios o algo por el estilo.

translation.en: The fact remains the evidence here is flimsy,
translation.es: El hecho es que las pruebas no son sólidas.

translation.en: it's bordering on ludicrous. Hey, this isn't a court room.
translation.es: - Es más, rayan lo ridículo. - Éste no es un juzgado.

translation.en: You're not arguing a case, and you're doing nothing but damage talking the way you are.
translation.es: No estás en un caso, y sólo provocas daño hablando así.

translation.en: And you can throw as much cow's blood around the loading dock as you want to,
translation.es: Y tú puedes arrojar toda la sangre de vaca que gustes en la zona de carga.

translation.en: you still haven't fooled anyone.
[Ollie] Leave it alone, David.
You can't convince some people
translation.es: Algunos no se convencen de que hay un incendio…

translation.en: there's a fire even when their hair is burning.
translation.es: Algunos no se convencen de que hay un incendio… …aun cuando tienen el cabello en llamas.

translation.en: Denial is a powerful thing.
Well, keep talking.
I'll have no part of it, nor would any thinking person.
translation.es: No participaré en esto, y tampoco lo haría una persona sensata.

translation.en: Keep thinking, Mr. Lawyer.
There's no defense against the will of God.
translation.es: No hay defensa contra la voluntad de Dios.

translation.en: There's no court of appeals in hell.
translation.es: No hay corte de apelaciones en el infierno.

translation.en: There's no defense here either,
not even with all the fertilizer in the world. Not even if you stack it as high as you can,
translation.es: Ni con todo el fertilizante del mundo, ni poniéndolo lo más alto posible.

translation.en: it's still just bags of shit, isn't it?
Those of you who want to discuss this thing rationally
translation.es: Los que quieran hablar sobre esto racionalmente…

translation.en: to find a means of rescue are welcome to join me.
translation.es: …para hallar una forma de conseguir ayuda serán bienvenidos.

translation.en: Those who want to stack dog food, knock yourselves out.
translation.es: Aquéllos que quieran apilar comida para perros… …que se diviertan.

translation.en: We got those windows taped up as best we could,
translation.es: Encintamos esas ventanas lo mejor posible.

translation.en: it should help.
Yeah, I think so.
Duct tape and dog food bags.
translation.es: Cinta adhesiva y bolsas de alimento para perro.

translation.en: That bad?
It's not good.
There's none so blind as those who will not see.
translation.es: No hay peor ciego que el que no quiere ver.

translation.en: Open your eyes.
Let the scales fall away.
translation.es: Dejen caer las vendas de sus ojos.

translation.en: This has all been written.
Revelations, chapter 15.
"And the temple was filled with smoke
from the glory of God, and from his power.
translation.es: …que procedía de la gloria… …y del poder de Dios…

translation.en: And no one could enter the temple
until the seven plagues of the seven angels were completed."
translation.es: …hasta que se terminaran las 7 plagas de los 7 ángeles".

translation.en: Well, what are you saying?
What are you proposing?
That we all prepare to meet our maker.
translation.es: Que todos nos preparemos… …para conocer a nuestro Creador.

translation.en: Oh, prepare to meet shit.
Lady, your tongue must be hung in the middle
translation.es: Señora, su lengua debe cortarse al medio…

translation.en: so that it could waggle at both ends.
No, the end time has come.
translation.es: Ha llegado el final de los tiempos…

translation.en: Not in flames, but in mist.
translation.es: …no en llamas, sino en forma de niebla.

translation.en: Come here!
Easy, man!
How about if your ass prepares to meet
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si su trasero se prepara para conocer mi bota?

translation.en: my size 10 work boot, how bout that?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si su trasero se prepara para conocer mi bota? ¿Qué le parece?

translation.en: Hey, there's no call for that.
Yeah, Myron, please, calm your friend down.
translation.es: Myron, por favor, calma a tu amigo.

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] I'm trying to save your soul, you stupid man. Doubters will doubt till the end.
translation.es: Estoy tratando de salvar su alma, hombre tonto.

translation.en: Don't worry, Billy, it's okay.
translation.es: - Los que duden dudarán hasta el final. - Está bien.

translation.en: A monstrosity did pull that poor boy away.
translation.es: No, disculpe, disculpe. Algo monstruoso se llevó a ese pobre niño.

translation.en: Things in the mist. Do you doubt?
translation.es: Cosas en la niebla… ¿Acaso lo dudan?

translation.en: Do you?
Then go out.
Go out and say "How do you do?"
Shut up, lady!
For God's sakes!
Look, you'll have to stop now, you're scaring the children.
translation.es: Ya no siga. Está asustando a los niños.

translation.en: They should be scared.
Oh yes, they should.
Their beautiful, pure little minds
translation.es: Sus mentes hermosas y puras han sido corrompidas con mentiras.

translation.en: have been corrupted with lies, lies.
translation.es: Sus mentes hermosas y puras han sido corrompidas con mentiras. Mentiras.

translation.en: All this talk of a modern God, or no God.
translation.es: Toda esta charla de un Dios moderno… …o de un Dios que no existe…

translation.en: There is one God. The God of the Israelites.
translation.es: Hay un Dios. El Dios de los israelitas.

translation.en: And he is a stern and vengeful God.
translation.es: Y Él es severo y vengativo…

translation.en: And we have been mocking him far too long.
translation.es: …y nos hemos burlado de El por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: And now he demands retribution and blood.
translation.es: Ahora quiere sangre a modo de retribución.

translation.en: It is time to declare yourselves.
translation.es: Es hora de exponer su postura.

translation.en: Take sides, the saved and the damned.
translation.es: De tomar partido… los salvados y los condenados.

translation.en: Read the Good Book, it calls for expiation, blood!
translation.es: Lean el buen libro. Llama a la expiación. - ¡Sangre! - ¿Qué?

translation.en: What?
Blood.
Little Normie was first,
translation.es: El pequeño Normie fue el primero…

translation.en: and now God calls the rest of us.
translation.es: …y ahora Dios busca al resto de nosotros.

translation.en: The bill is due. It must be paid.
translation.es: Hay que pagar las cuentas. Llegó la hora.

translation.en: As Abraham prepared to sacrifice his only son
translation.es: Como Abraham se preparó para sacrificar a su único hijo…

translation.en: to prove his love for God, so...
-[loud slap] -Enough.
Another down payment. A few more pennies in the jar.
translation.es: Otra cuota. Unas monedas más en el frasco.

translation.en: Now that's nice. See, I can't smack her, but it's okay for you?
translation.es: Qué bien, yo no puedo golpearla, pero usted sí.

translation.en: I'm sorry everybody, but this lady's perspective
translation.es: Les pido disculpas… …pero la visión de esta señora tiene demasiado gusto a Viejo Testamento.

translation.en: is a little too Old Testament for my tastes.
translation.es: …pero la visión de esta señora tiene demasiado gusto a Viejo Testamento.

translation.en: They'll come for you.
Maybe tonight when darkness comes.
translation.es: Tal vez por la noche, cuando esté oscuro.

translation.en: They'll come tonight. And they'll take someone else.
translation.es: Vendrán esta noche y se llevarán a alguien más.

translation.en: See if they don't.
And when they do, you will cry to God,
translation.es: Y cuando lo hagan, le llorarán a Dios…

translation.en: and you will beg Mother Carmody to show you the way.
translation.es: …y le rogarán a la madre Carmody que les muestre el camino.

translation.en: That's fine.
Until then if you don't shut up,
translation.es: Pero hasta entonces, si no se calla…

translation.en: I'll wrap this tape around your mouth.
translation.es: Pero hasta entonces, si no se calla… …le taparé la boca con esta cinta.

translation.en: You just try it, Ollie Weeks.
And you, bitch.
You hit me again, if you dare.
You'll be on your knees to me before this is through.
translation.es: Te pondrás de rodillas ante mí antes de que esto termine.

translation.en: Those of you who aren't locals should know
translation.es: Los que no viven por aquí…

translation.en: that Mrs. Carmody is known in town for being unstable.
translation.es: …sepan que a la señora Carmody se la conoce por ser… …inestable.

translation.en: No shit. What was your first clue?
translation.es: No digas. ¿Qué te dio la pauta?

translation.en: Hi.
Sup, little dude?
How come your friends don't come get us?
translation.es: ¿Por qué sus amigos no vienen por nosotros?

translation.en: They got tanks and stuff, right?
Why can't you just call 'em?
Phones don't work.
But don't you got like a radio?
Hey champ, what's going on?
I want their friends to come rescue us.
translation.es: Quiero que sus amigos vengan a rescatarnos.

translation.en: They would if they could, pal, they're stuck here just like us.
translation.es: Lo harían si pudieran. Pero están atrapados como nosotros.

translation.en: -But- -Shh.
Guys, we could use a hand over there.
translation.es: Muchachos, necesitamos una mano por allí.

translation.en: Yeah, sure thing.
Troop, off your asses.
You all right? I don't like that scary lady.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - No me gusta la mujer que asusta.

translation.en: Oh, man, I don't either.
But you know what?
Maybe she's scared too.
You think?
You think Mommy's okay?
Billy...
I'm sorry about the times I was bad to her.
Oh, hey. Mommy loves you very much,
translation.es: Oye, oye… mamá te quiere muchísimo.

translation.en: and I bet she's fine.
And I promise you, I'm gonna do everything I can to get us back to her.
translation.es: Y te prometo que haré lo imposible por reunirnos con ella.

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
So we can use the charcoal fluid and the mops to make torches,
translation.es: Podemos usar líquido inflamable y trapeadores para hacer antorchas.

translation.en: and we've got knives and stuff, God knows.
translation.es: Tenemos cuchillos y demás elementos filosos.

translation.en: This may be a silly question, Bud,
translation.es: Quizá sea una pregunta tonta, Bud, pero…

translation.en: but do you happen to have a gun in the store?
translation.es: Quizá sea una pregunta tonta, Bud, pero… …¿tienes un arma en el local?

translation.en: Here? No.
Please, this isn't Los Angeles.
I've got a shotgun in my truck.
translation.es: Yo tengo una escopeta en mi camioneta.

translation.en: I could try for it if you want.
Oh God, I don't think that would be a good idea, Mr. Cornell.
translation.es: No creo que sea buena idea, señor Cornell.

translation.en: Hold on.
This gun, uh, my husband's idea.
translation.es: Este revólver… fue idea de mi esposo.

translation.en: He's away on business a lot. It's not even loaded.
translation.es: Viaja mucho por trabajo. No está cargado.

translation.en: Ain't much use unloaded, ma'am.
translation.es: No sirve mucho sin balas, señora.

translation.en: You know how to use that?
Well, I shot it once on a pistol range, hit the target a few times.
translation.es: Fui a un campo de tiro una vez, y le di al blanco unas veces.

translation.en: So, we've got a gun. Anybody know how to shoot it?
translation.es: Tenemos un arma. ¿Alguien sabe cómo usarla?

translation.en: Well, I mean? I do.
translation.es: - Me refiero a usarla bien. - Yo sé.

translation.en: You? Ollie, please.
Some target shooting.
State champion in '94.
Hey, you're crazy if you go out there.
translation.es: Fui campeón estatal en el 94. - ¡Es una locura salir! - ¡Déjennos pasar!

translation.en: Let us pass!
Let us pass, please! Let's just talk this thing through.
[Norton] We have, and we made our decision. We're leaving.
translation.es: Ya lo hicimos y tomamos una decisión. Nos vamos.

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Mackey's gonna barbecue some chicken on the gas grill.
translation.es: El señor Mackey asará pollo en la parrilla.

translation.en: Why don't we just sit down and- What, and let you keep on talking?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no nos sentamos…? - ¿Y te dejamos seguir hablando?

translation.en: No, I've been in far too many court rooms to fall for that.
translation.es: No, he estado en muchos juzgados para caer en ésa.

translation.en: You've already psyched out half a dozen of my people already.
translation.es: Ya pusiste paranoica a media docena de mi gente.

translation.en: Your people?
They are people, that's all.
translation.es: ¿Qué forma de hablar es ésa? Son personas, punto.

translation.en: Now, listen everyone.
We are experiencing some kind of disaster.
translation.es: Estamos pasando por algún tipo de catástrofe.

translation.en: I don't know whether it's man-made or natural,
translation.es: No sé si es algo natural o causado por el hombre…

translation.en: but I do know that it's definitely not supernatural,
translation.es: No sé si es algo natural o causado por el hombre… …pero sí sé que no es sobrenatural…

translation.en: or Biblical. And no offense, Mrs. Carmody,
translation.es: …o bíblico, y no se ofenda, señora Carmody…

translation.en: but the only way we're gonna help ourselves is to seek rescue.
translation.es: …pero la única forma de ayudarnos es buscar auxilio.

translation.en: We're going out.
Brent, look. I'm not discussing this any further.
translation.es: - Brent, mira… - No hablaré más sobre esto.

translation.en: I know. I just want to ask a favor.
translation.es: Lo sé. Sólo quiero pedirte un favor.

translation.en: Tie this around your waist.
translation.es: Átate esto alrededor de la cintura.

translation.en: What for?
It'll let us know you got at least 300 feet.
translation.es: Así sabremos si caminaste al menos 100 metros.

translation.en: I'll do it.
Are you throwing in with them? Me? No thanks.
I think your man there's a little too tightly wound.
translation.es: Me parece que el señor está un poco tenso…

translation.en: Gonna get somebody killed.
I'm thinking we could use that shotgun of yours.
translation.es: Pero creo que su escopeta nos servirá.

translation.en: I saw where you parked when I pulled in.
Red pickup, right? Far entrance?
translation.es: La camioneta roja, ¿cierto? ¿En la entrada alejada?

translation.en: Son, you've got brass balls.
translation.es: Hijo, tienes unas bolas de acero.

translation.en: The shells are in the glove compartment, drive it back.
translation.es: Los cartuchos están en la guantera. Tráelos.

translation.en: All right.
Just see they're paying out this line.
Line's up, I'll cut her loose. Just so you understand.
translation.es: Cuando se termine, la cortaré sólo para que entiendan.

translation.en: Yeah.
You sure there's no way I can talk you out of this?
David, there's nothing out there. Nothing in the mist.
translation.es: David, no hay nada afuera. No hay nada en la niebla.

translation.en: What if you were wrong?
Then I guess the joke would be on me after all.
We're gonna send back help.
You'll die out there, all of you.
Hey, crazy lady. I believe in God too,
translation.es: Oiga, mujer loca, yo también creo en Dios.

translation.en: I just don't think he's the bloodthirsty asshole
translation.es: Sólo que no creo que sea un desgraciado sediento de sangre…

translation.en: you make him out to be.
Well, you take that up with the devil when you run into him.
translation.es: Háblelo con el diablo cuando lo vea.

translation.en: Just chat it over at your leisure.
Well, let's strike out toward the center of town.
translation.es: Vayamos hacia el centro de la ciudad.

translation.en: Keep it loose.
[Jim] Nice and easy.
Keep goin'.
Look.
It's goin'.
They're doing good.
Put it down!
Pull!
I'm slipping!
Pull! Back up, back up, back up!
Get it off!
Oh my God.
Oh my God.
Oh my God.
Oh my God.
Cut the rope!
Shut the door!
Now do you see?
Now do you believe?
About a half hour of daylight left.
translation.es: Falta media hora para que oscurezca.

translation.en: Guys, how's it going with these work lights?
We're getting them rigged up, all right.
Yeah, check it out.
All right, all right, save it, save it.
These batteries ain't topped up.
translation.es: Las baterías no están bien cargadas.

translation.en: If you turn the lights on, it's gonna drain them quick.
translation.es: Se descargarán rápido cuando encendamos las luz.

translation.en: How quick?
Five minutes, maybe 10? Yeah, if that.
translation.es: - En 5 minutos, tal vez 10. - Si llega a tanto.

translation.en: Okay. Emergencies only.
If something gets in the store.
Holy Jesus, you scared the shit outta me.
translation.es: Jesús santo, casi me matas del susto.

translation.en: Oh, Sally, I'm sorry, really.
I thought I'd come in and say hi and see how you were holding up.
translation.es: Quería saludarte y saber cómo estabas.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
Barely, how about you?
I'm worried about my folks, I guess.
You know, they live up on Shorham Road,
that's less than 5 miles from here.
translation.es: Queda a menos de 5 millas de aquí.

translation.en: Oh, how about yours?
Oh, they're out of town right now.
They're at my aunt's in Boston, so.
translation.es: Fueron a lo de mi tía en Boston.

translation.en: That's lucky. That means they're okay.
translation.es: Qué suerte. Significa que están bien.

translation.en: I hope so.
So...
How soon you shippin' out?
Uh, a couple weeks.
Scared about going over there?
Yeah.
Hey, Wayne? Hm?
How come you never asked me out?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nunca me invitaste a salir?

translation.en: We flirted all through high school, I know you like me.
translation.es: Coqueteamos en la secundaria, y sé que te gusto.

translation.en: So, how come?
I'm stupid, I guess.
Oh, shit, I'm sorry.
Don't be, I just...
I just didn't really want it to happen like this, you know?
translation.es: Es sólo que no quería que pasara así.

translation.en: Some shitty locker room at work.
translation.es: En una habitación de porquería del trabajo.

translation.en: Can we just stay in here a while then?
Okay, just you and me?
The parking lot lamps turned on.
translation.es: Se encendieron las luces del estacionamiento.

translation.en: [Ollie] They're on a timer.
Must be a different one that's live.
translation.es: Deben ser de un abastecedor que tiene energía.

translation.en: [Dan] Maybe we could tie into them somehow. Get some electricity in here.
translation.es: Tal vez podamos conectarnos de alguna manera y traer luz aquí.

translation.en: That would mean walking out the door.
Ah, God!
Oh my God.
Billy, Billy. David! David!
Look!
My God.
Bugs?
Not like any I've ever seen.
translation.es: No se parecen en nada a los que conozco.

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] "They came out of the smoke. Locusts upon the earth.
translation.es: "De la humareda descendieron langostas sobre la tierra…

translation.en: And unto them was given power,
even as the scorpions of the earth have power."
translation.es: …como el que tienen los escorpiones de la tierra".

translation.en: Look at those stingers.
Dear God.
Holy shit!
Myron, get the ones in the back.
God, I think they're attracted to the light.
translation.es: Creo que los atrae la luz. ¡Cuidado, cuidado, cuidado!

translation.en: Look out, look out, look out!
Douse the light!
[Jim] Look out, look out!
Move, move!
Light, light, light, light, light!
[Mrs. Carmody] "And there come a voice from the temple, saying to the seven angels...
translation.es: "Oí una voz que desde el templo decía a gritos a los 7 ángeles:

translation.en: Go your ways, and pour out the vials of the wrath of God upon the earth."
translation.es: 'Vayan y derramen sobre la tierra las 7 copas del furor de Dios'.

translation.en: Ollie, the glass is gonna give!
Shit.
[Ollie] Oh my God, they turned on all the lights.
Jim, Myron! Fire! Light it!
Light it!
Come on, come on!
Sally, look out!
Let me see, let me see sweetheart, let me see.
No, you're gonna be okay, you're gonna be okay.
translation.es: Vas a estar bien. Vas a estar bien.

translation.en: Let me see, let me see.
You're fine, you're gonna be okay, you're gonna be okay.
translation.es: Estás bien. Vas a estar bien.

translation.en: Gimme the lighter, for the fire!
Goddamn childproofing sons of bitches.
translation.es: Malditos hijos de puta con protección para niños.

translation.en: Oh shit!
Shoot it!
I can't, I'll smash the window!
God! Go, go!
Get down!
Shit!
Ollie, you want these lights on or off? Leave them on!
Oh, God!
Kill it!
Bring torches! We need something to keep 'em out!
Come on!
Sally!
Where are the goddamn extinguishers?
Get it, get it, get it!
Bring torches! We need torches at the window!
translation.es: Traigan antorchas. ¡Necesitamos antorchas en la ventana!

translation.en: Plug that hole!
Dad!
Down, down, lay down!
My life.
translation.es: Mi vida… mi vida por Ti.

translation.en: My life for you,
translation.es: Mi vida… mi vida por Ti. Que se haga tu voluntad.

translation.en: your will be done.
Daddy!
Daddy!
No! Daddy!
-Billy! -Daddy!
Billy!
Dad!
Billy, please!
Billy!
[Bobby] Hurry up with the blankets!
translation.es: Estoy aquí. Estoy aquí. No te preocupes. ¡Apúrense con las frazadas!

translation.en: [Joe] It hurts so bad!
It hurts so bad!
Did we get 'em? Did we get 'em all?
She was right.
She said that it would happen like this.
She said that they would come at night.
She told us someone would die.
Mommy.
Shh, shh, shh, it's okay.
It's okay, it's just a dream.
translation.es: Está bien, sólo fue un sueño.

translation.en: It's just a bad dream.
I want my mommy.
I know.
I know, of course you do.
Shh. I want to go home.
Just sleep.
Everything will be better in the morning.
translation.es: Todo estará mejor en la mañana.

translation.en: I think he likes you.
Well, I hate that I had to lie to him.
You have kids? No.
I always wanted to, but things haven't been working out.
translation.es: Siempre quise, pero… …las cosas no salieron bien.

translation.en: Right now I'm thinking maybe that's for the best.
translation.es: Ahora pienso que tal vez fue lo mejor.

translation.en: I saw creatures fly into the store tonight,
translation.es: Esta noche vi volando hacia la tienda criaturas que…

translation.en: they shouldn't exist.
I keep thinking I'm gonna wake up in a rubber room.
translation.es: Sigo pensando que despertaré en un manicomio.

translation.en: You're not alone in that. We're all right there with you.
translation.es: No eres la única. Todos estamos igual.

translation.en: This isn't gonna end, is it?
[Ollie] David.
It's Joe, he's getting worse.
How you holdin' up, partner?
[Joe] David, is that you?
Yeah, pal, how are doin'?
It's bad, he's bad.
I didn't know anything could hurt like this.
translation.es: No sabía que existía un dolor así.

translation.en: If you guys can't help me, you gotta end it, okay?
translation.es: Si no pueden ayudarme… …tienes que terminarlo.

translation.en: Ollie's got that gun, right?
Right? No, no way.
[Joe] You can't fuck with me on this, bro.
translation.es: No me puedes joder en ésta, hermano.

translation.en: Not with me like this.
I'll do it. Just give me the gun!
We're not there yet, okay? Please!
Joe, listen.
Pal.
We're gonna work something out,
I just need you to hang in a little longer, okay? Can you do that?
translation.es: Sólo necesito que aguantes un poco más. ¿Puedes hacerlo?

translation.en: Stay with him, I'll be back.
Hattie, I need to go to the bathroom, will you watch Billy?
translation.es: Hattie, necesito ir al baño. ¿Cuidas a Billy?

translation.en: Hattie?
See anything?
The last of those bugs went away about four.
translation.es: El último bicho se fue a eso de las 4.00.

translation.en: Dawn's coming.
What's on your mind? It's Joe.
If we don't get him on some serious antibiotics he's gonna die of infection.
translation.es: Si no le damos antibióticos, morirá de una infección.

translation.en: Plus he needs painkillers in the worst way.
All we've got here is liquor and aspirin.
translation.es: Lo único que tenemos es bebidas alcohólicas y aspirina.

translation.en: You thinking about going to the pharmacy next door?
translation.es: ¿Estás pensando ir a la farmacia de al lado?

translation.en: Irene Reppler says they've got Silvadene. You know, the stuff they use in burn wards.
translation.es: Irene Reppler dice que tienen Silvadene, lo que usan para los quemados.

translation.en: She knows where they keep it.
Slow down.
You can't actually be thinking of doing this.
I'm also thinking beyond that.
We have to get out of here. I mean, permanently.
translation.es: Tenemos que irnos de aquí. Digo, definitivamente.

translation.en: Why? We've got plenty to eat.
And what happens when one of those things decides to break through this window?
translation.es: ¿Qué sucederá si una de esas cosas decide romper la ventana?

translation.en: I'm talking one of the big ones, like the one that killed Norm.
translation.es: Una de las grandes, como la que mató a Norm.

translation.en: Yeah, then the flaming torch idea didn't work so well, did it?
translation.es: Sí, y la idea de la antorcha no funcionó muy bien, ¿no?

translation.en: We almost burned the goddamn store down.
It's Hattie.
Here?
Gently now, gently.
One, two, three!
I don't know how long she was there like that, lying there next to us.
translation.es: No sé cuánto estuvo así, acostada al lado nuestro.

translation.en: I thought she was sleeping.
I got my 4-wheel drive.
It's out there.
You're talking about leaving?
Well, we should hit the pharmacy first.
translation.es: Bueno… primero deberíamos ir a la farmacia.

translation.en: We gotta bring back supplies for the injured.
I mean, if we don't, Joe Eagleton's gonna die,
translation.es: Digo, si no lo hacemos… …Joe Eagleton morirá, y no podemos dejar que pase.

translation.en: and we can't let that happen.
translation.es: …Joe Eagleton morirá, y no podemos dejar que pase.

translation.en: But after that...
Look, my Land Cruiser can hold eight people.
translation.es: En mi Land Cruiser entran 8 personas.

translation.en: I say we drive south as far as the fuel takes us
translation.es: Vayamos al sur hasta donde alcance la gasolina…

translation.en: and try to keep clear of this mist.
translation.es: …y tratemos de salir de esta niebla.

translation.en: That's it?
That's the plan?
That's what I got. No, you can't mean it.
translation.es: - Es lo que tengo. - No puedes hablar en serio.

translation.en: Not after what happened to Norton and his group.
translation.es: No después de lo que le pasó a Norton y su grupo.

translation.en: No, no, no. Amanda, think.
Norton got over 200 feet from this store,
translation.es: Norton se alejó más de 200 pies de la tienda.

translation.en: that's how much rope played out.
translation.es: Era toda la soga que tenía.

translation.en: I'm parked half that distance from here.
translation.es: Mi vehículo está a la mitad de esa distancia.

translation.en: But who knows how far this mist has spread.
translation.es: ¿Pero quién sabe hasta dónde llega esta niebla?

translation.en: It could be the entire eastern seaboard.
translation.es: Podría estar en toda la costa este.

translation.en: Yeah, it could be the whole world for all we know,
translation.es: Sí, podría estar en todo el mundo, por lo que sabemos.

translation.en: wouldn't make us any less dead, now would it?
translation.es: No haría que estemos menos muertos, ¿o sí?

translation.en: We have 1 gun, how many rounds?
translation.es: Tenemos sólo un revólver. - ¿Cuántas balas? - Quedan 10.

translation.en: We got 10 left.
10 rounds, Jesus.
Okay, so 10.
Want another reason to get the hell outta here?
translation.es: ¿Quieren otro motivo para irnos de aquí?

translation.en: I'll give you the best one. Her.
translation.es: Les daré el mejor motivo. Ella.

translation.en: Mrs. Carmody.
She's our very own Jim Jones.
I'd like to leave before people start drinking the Kool-Aid.
translation.es: Quisiera irme antes de que la gente empiece a tomar Kool-Aid.

translation.en: He's right.
translation.es: Es cierto. Si sigue habiendo muertos, parecerá que ella tiene razón.

translation.en: The flakier people get, the better she's gonna look.
translation.es: Si sigue habiendo muertos, parecerá que ella tiene razón.

translation.en: No, I don't buy that. It's obvious she's nuts.
translation.es: No, no lo creo. Es obvio que está loca.

translation.en: Look, a few people, maybe.
But- No, I count 4. She's preaching to 'em right now.
translation.es: Yo cuento 4. Les está predicando ahora mismo.

translation.en: By noon, she'll have 4 more.
By tomorrow night, when those things come back,
translation.es: Para mañana a la noche, cuando esas cosas regresen…

translation.en: she'll have a congregation,
and then we can start worrying about
translation.es: …y ahí podemos empezar a preocuparnos sobre a quién va a sacrificar…

translation.en: who she's gonna sacrifice to make it all better.
translation.es: …y ahí podemos empezar a preocuparnos sobre a quién va a sacrificar… …para mejorar todo.

translation.en: You, Amanda? My little boy?
[Dan] He's right.
You don't have much faith in humanity, do you?
translation.es: No tienes mucha fe en la humanidad, ¿verdad?

translation.en: None whatsoever.
I can't accept that.
People are basically good, decent.
translation.es: La gente es esencialmente buena y decente.

translation.en: My God, David, we're a civilized society.
translation.es: Por Dios, David, somos una sociedad civilizada.

translation.en: Sure, as long as the machines are working and you can dial 9-1-1,
translation.es: Siempre y cuando todo funcione y puedas llamar al 911.

translation.en: but you take those things away, you throw people in the dark,
translation.es: Pero sin eso, los echas a oscuras, les das el susto de sus vidas…

translation.en: you scare the shit outta them, no more rules.
translation.es: Pero sin eso, los echas a oscuras, les das el susto de sus vidas… …y quitas todas las reglas, y verás cuán primitivos se ponen.

translation.en: You'll see how primitive they get.
translation.es: …y quitas todas las reglas, y verás cuán primitivos se ponen.

translation.en: If you scare people badly enough, you can get 'em to do anything.
translation.es: Si asustas a la gente lo suficiente, puedes hacer que hagan lo que sea.

translation.en: They'll turn to whoever promises a solution. Or whatever.
translation.es: Irán con cualquiera que prometa una solución… o algo.

translation.en: Ollie, please, back me up here?
I wish I could.
As a species, we're fundamentally insane.
Put more than two of us in a room,
translation.es: Si juntas a más de dos en un cuarto, elegimos un bando…

translation.en: we pick sides and start dreaming up reasons
translation.es: Si juntas a más de dos en un cuarto, elegimos un bando… …y empezamos a soñar motivos para matarnos.

translation.en: to kill one another.
translation.es: …y empezamos a soñar motivos para matarnos.

translation.en: Why'd you think we invented politics and religion?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que inventamos la política y la religión?

translation.en: Oh, Jesus, that's just wrong.
Look, nobody has to decide anything now, okay?
translation.es: Mira, nadie tiene que decidir nada ahora.

translation.en: First things first, the pharmacy.
That'll be our test run.
Okay?
It's all right, Big Bill. I'll bring you back some comic books.
translation.es: Está bien, Gran Bill. Te traeré historietas.

translation.en: I don't want them.
I want you to stay here.
translation.es: Quiero que te quedes aquí. No tardaré mucho.

translation.en: I won't be gone long.
It's just next door.
You'll be safe.
Daddy, Daddy, there are things out there.
Things...
Yeah. There's a lot less of them in the daytime.
translation.es: Sí. Hay muchas menos cuando hay luz.

translation.en: They'll wait. They'll wait in the mist where you can't see them,
translation.es: Esperarán en la niebla, donde no puedes verlas…

translation.en: and then when you go and can't get back in,
translation.es: …y cuando vayas y no puedas volver…

translation.en: they'll come and eat you up!
Daddy, don't go!
I'll be back.
Big Bill, I promise.
I'll be back and then I'm gonna take you home.
translation.es: Regresaré y te llevaré de vuelta a casa.

translation.en: All right?
Together, we're going home.
If something happens, anything at all, you cut and run.
translation.es: Si pasa algo, cualquier cosa, corre.

translation.en: You get your ass back in here, for your boy's sake.
If something happens to me,
translation.es: Si me pasa algo, quiero que cuides a Billy…

translation.en: I want you to take care of Billy as best as you can,
translation.es: Si me pasa algo, quiero que cuides a Billy… …lo mejor que puedas, por el tiempo que puedas.

translation.en: as long as you can.
translation.es: …lo mejor que puedas, por el tiempo que puedas.

translation.en: The Land Cruiser is yours now.
translation.es: El Land Cruiser es tuyo ahora.

translation.en: You get him out of here, you just keep driving.
translation.es: Sácalo de aquí. Conduce y aléjate.

translation.en: Where do you think you're going, Mr. David Drayton?
translation.es: ¿Adónde piensa que va, señor David Drayton?

translation.en: Are you so anxious to make your boy an orphan?
translation.es: ¿Está ansioso por dejar huérfano a su hijo?

translation.en: My boy is no concern of yours.
translation.es: Mi hijo no es problema suyo.

translation.en: Listen up. We're going to the pharmacy.
We're gonna bring back some supplies.
Also, there may be people trapped over there who need help.
translation.es: Además, puede haber gente atrapada allí que necesite ayuda. ¡Escuchen, amigos, escuchen!

translation.en: Folks, listen!
We're not gonna take any chances.
If there's any trouble,
we'll come straight back here to the supermarket.
And bring the fiends of hell down on our heads, thank you.
translation.es: Y traerán a las bestias del infierno con ustedes, muchas gracias.

translation.en: She's right.
You'll make them notice us. You'll make them come.
translation.es: Harán que nos vean. Harán que vengan.

translation.en: Why can't you just leave well enough alone?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no pueden dejar las cosas como están?

translation.en: Lady, is this what you call well enough?
translation.es: Señora, ¿le parece que las cosas están bien?

translation.en: If you want to stop us,
you better explain to Bobby here
why we're not bringing painkillers and medicine back for his brother.
translation.es: …por qué no traeremos las medicinas para su hermano.

translation.en: [Bobby] No, I'm going. Even if I have to go alone.
translation.es: Iré, aunque tenga que ir solo.

translation.en: You'll die out there, young man.
You'll walk out that door and be torn to shreds,
translation.es: Saldrá por esa puerta y lo harán pedazos…

translation.en: and then your hell-bound pride will have them come get the rest of us.
translation.es: …y entonces su maldito orgullo hará que vengan por nosotros.

translation.en: Yes, they'll come back for all of us, just like this good lady said.
translation.es: Volverán por todos nosotros, como dijo esta buena mujer.

translation.en: Do you want that to happen, people?
No! No, no, no!
Well, it is this kind of hubris
translation.es: Bueno, éste es el tipo de soberbia…

translation.en: that brought the wrath of God in the first place.
translation.es: …que trajo la ira de Dios en un principio.

translation.en: This kind of pride and defiance of the...
translation.es: Este tipo de orgullo y rebeldía…

translation.en: Shut up, you miserable buzzard!
You old bitch! No, no, no, no, no!
Stoning people who piss you off is perfectly okay.
