translation.es: Es correcto apedrear a los que te ofenden.

translation.en: They do it in the Bible, don't they?
And I got lots of peas.
David, please, if you want to go, now's the time.
translation.es: David, si quieres irte, ahora es el momento.

translation.en: How bout it, Army?
Any help from the armed forces?
I'll go.
I had you in school, didn't I?
Yes, me and my sister Pauline.
translation.es: Sí, y mi hermana Pauline también.

translation.en: A pair of underachievers.
After you, Jim.
Yes, ma'am.
Shit.
Is that it? That's everybody?
Everybody that's going?
Yes. Okay.
Single file, one by one, all right?
translation.es: Una fila, de a uno, ¿está bien?

translation.en: Let's get this thing over with.
After you. Yes.
Stay together.
Mrs. Carmody, you're not helping. I don't care.
Shut the hell up! You shut up!
Save the batteries.
[David] Shit.
They left the doors propped open.
[Ollie] Think something got in?
[David] Let's just get what we need, get the hell outta here.
translation.es: Sólo… tomemos lo que necesitemos y vayámonos de aquí.

translation.en: [Ollie] Yeah, let's do that.
[Irene] The meds are over at the end there, in the cubicle.
translation.es: Las medicinas están ahí al final, en el cubículo.

translation.en: [David] Will you not do that?
[Jim] I'm sorry. I'm sorry!
God.
Where's that Silvadene?
It's over behind David. In the fridge, check there.
translation.es: Ahí, detrás de David. En el refrigerador. Fíjate ahí.

translation.en: [David] Silvadene, got it.
Good. [David] Ollie, what are we looking for?
Penicillin.
Yeah. Any strong antibiotics.
Pain meds, Vicodin, or Oxycontin.
Oxycontin.
Hydrochloride?
Penicillin.
[David] Guys...
[Dan] Hurry it up, I hear something.
What?
Something fuckin' weird.
Oh, God.
Oh, God.
No. Oh, no.
Oh, no!
Aw, fuck!
Look, there's another one.
Oh my God. No, no, no.
Oh, no, no!
Guys, let's get out of here, now.
Holy shit!
I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
Help me!
translation.es: Lo siento. Lo siento. Ayúdenme. ¡Dios mío! Ayúdenlo.

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
translation.es: Hijo de puta. Esta cosa no se sale.

translation.en: This stuff ain't coming off.
Aw, man. [Jessup] He's glued to this fuckin' post.
It's our fault.
It's all our fault.
It's really stuck.
[M.P.] I can feel them.
I can feel them.
Jesus.
Oh my God.
There's more!
[Jim] There's another one!
[Dan] Ollie, Ollie!
translation.es: ¿Qué demonios es esa cosa? ¡Ollie! ¡Hay uno allí!

translation.en: One over there.
Ollie, Ollie, there.
There, there.
[Jim] Shoot, shoot!
[Ollie] Shit.
Bobby!
Bobby, hold on!
Hold on!
Cut the strand!
Help me!
[David] A belt! Who's got a belt?
translation.es: - ¿Quién tiene un cinturón? - Yo tengo un cinturón.

translation.en: [Mike] I got him, I got him.
Light.
Light!
[David] Come on, come on!
Let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go!
Watch it, watch it!
[Ollie] All right, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Come on!
Come on!
Jim, go!
Ollie! Ollie!
[Jim] Kill it, kill it!
Fuckers.
[Jessup] Oh, no.
God, he's dead, he's dead! Get outta here! Come on, let's go, let's go!
Come on, come on, come on!
Come on, Drayton, he's dead!
Come on!
Open the door!
-[yelling] -Where's Bobby?
Daddy!
[Bud] Come on, come on, hurry up!
What happened?
[Jim] They're dead! They're all dead!
[Mrs. Carmody] Expiation, because we have seen
that the earth is scourged with whips and scorpions.
translation.es: …la tierra azotada por flagelos y escorpiones.

translation.en: We have seen the earth vomit forth from her lips
translation.es: Hemos visto la tierra vomitar de sus labios…

translation.en: obscenities and profanities of such nightmare proportions.
translation.es: …obscenidades y profanidades como salidas de pesadillas.

translation.en: And for these evil, lurking spirits
translation.es: Y para estos espíritus malignos y al acecho…

translation.en: and all these evil people with greed-
How long was I out?
Most of the day.
You just came over here, lied down, and went to sleep.
translation.es: Viniste aquí a recostarte y te dormiste.

translation.en: Just passed out is more like it.
translation.es: Más bien me desmayé. ¿Qué detendrá a esta Gran Prostituta?

translation.en: I just shut down for a while.
I'm sorry.
[Mrs. Carmody] Expiation!
Expiation! Do you remember yesterday-
How's Joe?
Dead. Joe died of his burns while you were asleep.
translation.es: Muerto. Murió de las quemaduras mientras dormías.

translation.en: We were just too late.
[Mrs. Carmody] I told you thi was-
God, I thought I was dreaming her voice.
translation.es: Dios, pensé que estaba soñando su voz.

translation.en: No dream.
She's getting people whipped up.
translation.es: Está alterando a la gente. ¡Esa pobre muchacha está muerta…

translation.en: That poor girl is dead.
And that boy is burnt in the backroom.
translation.es: …y ese muchacho quemado en el cuarto de atrás!

translation.en: She's got them believing she's a psychic. She has a direct line to God.
translation.es: Les hizo creer que es psíquica, que tiene una línea directa con Dios.

translation.en: Why wouldn't they? Woman never shuts up.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no le creen? La mujer nunca se calla.

translation.en: Like those speeches Castro used to make.
translation.es: Como los discursos que daba Castro.

translation.en: Ollie says you're thinking of leaving.
I'm in.
No, sorry.
I mean, come on, you saw what happened to Bobby, Mike.
translation.es: Digo, vamos, vieron lo que les pasó a Bobby… a Mike…

translation.en: I won't do that again, I won't be responsible.
translation.es: …no lo haré otra vez. No seré responsable.

translation.en: You might want to reconsider that.
[Mrs. Carmody] What will keep these evil, these abominations at bay?
translation.es: ¿Qué mantendrá esta maldad, estas abominaciones a raya?

translation.en: What will keep them away?
"The rock will not hide them, the dead tree give no shelter"
translation.es: "La roca no los ocultará. El árbol muerto no da cobijo".

translation.en: What will end it, let me hear it?
Expiation!
What are we talking about?
Expiation! Good, say it again like you mean it.
Expiation!
Welcome to Sesame Street. Today's word is "expiation".
translation.es: Bienvenidos a Calle Sésamo. La palabra de hoy es "expiación".

translation.en: Hallelujah, hallelujah!
That boy hasn't been right since the pharmacy.
translation.es: Ese muchacho no está bien desde lo de la farmacia. Su cerebro colapsó. Está ido.

translation.en: His mind's just snapped, gone.
Hasn't even been two days.
translation.es: No han pasado ni dos días.

translation.en: Not even two days.
I'm not spending the rest of my life here,
I tell you what.
translation.es: Yo no moriré aquí dentro. Puedo juntar unos víveres en silencio…

translation.en: I can quietly gather up some bags of groceries
translation.es: Puedo juntar unos víveres en silencio…

translation.en: and hide them up at one of the check stands by the door.
translation.es: …y esconderlos en una de las cajas cerca de la puerta.

translation.en: [Dan] It was your idea, it's your vehicle,
translation.es: Fue tu idea. Es tu vehículo.

translation.en: it'll be your call.
I'd rather die out there trying than in here waiting.
translation.es: Prefiero morir afuera haciendo algo que morir esperando.

translation.en: Who will save them? No one.
The rock will not.
translation.es: Las piedras no les darán refugio.

translation.en: I want some idea of what we're up against.
translation.es: Quiero saber a qué nos enfrentamos.

translation.en: I want to know what this mist is.
translation.es: Quiero saber qué es esta niebla.

translation.en: I want to talk to the soldiers. Soldiers?
translation.es: - Quiero hablar con los soldados. - ¿Los soldados? ¿De qué servirá eso?

translation.en: What's that gonna do?
translation.es: - Quiero hablar con los soldados. - ¿Los soldados? ¿De qué servirá eso? Oíste lo que dijo ese policía en la farmacia.

translation.en: You heard what the MP said at the pharmacy.
translation.es: Oíste lo que dijo ese policía en la farmacia.

translation.en: David, I'm not even sure I knew he was talking.
translation.es: Ni siquiera estoy seguro de que haya hablado.

translation.en: The situation was insane.
He said he was sorry, wasn't that the word he used?
translation.es: Dijo que lo sentía. ¿No fue eso lo que dijo, "lo siento"?

translation.en: Sorry? That's right, he said it was their fault, right?
translation.es: Así es. Dijo que era su culpa, ¿cierto?

translation.en: What did he mean by that?
That's what we're gonna find out.
Irene, stay with Billy, please.
translation.es: Irene, quédate con Billy, por favor.

translation.en: Verse 17!
"Poured out his vial into the air,
and there came a great voice
translation.es: …y desde el trono del templo salió un vozarrón que decía:

translation.en: out of the temple of heaven from the throne saying,
translation.es: …y desde el trono del templo salió un vozarrón que decía: '¡Se acabó! ¡Se acabó!'

translation.en: it is done, it is done!
And there were voices, and lighting, and thunders, and a great earthquake, yet as we've not seen."
translation.es: Y hubo relámpagos, estruendos, truenos y un violento terremoto".

translation.en: Yes, come to me!
What?
Where's your friends? I ain't seen 'em.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde están tus amigos? - No los he visto.

translation.en: Not that big a store, it's kinda hard to lose.
translation.es: El lugar no es tan grande. Es difícil perderse.

translation.en: I ain't seen 'em, I said. Do I look like their keeper?
translation.es: No los he visto. ¿Parezco su niñera?

translation.en: What do you want from me? What do you know about this mist?
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieren de mí? - ¿Qué sabes de esta niebla?

translation.en: I don't know nothin', I got nothin' to do with it.
translation.es: No sé nada. No tengo nada que ver con ella.

translation.en: That's what the MP said in the pharmacy
translation.es: No es lo que el policía dijo en la farmacia…

translation.en: before the spiders came out of his skin.
translation.es: …antes de que las arañas salieran de su cuerpo.

translation.en: They're not in the store.
The only place we haven't looked is the loading dock.
translation.es: El único lugar en el que no miramos es la zona de carga.

translation.en: Because you know, you saw the good face of God tonight.
translation.es: Porque tú sabes. Tú viste el buen rostro de Dios esta noche.

translation.en: Yes?
Tell us.
translation.es: Aquí hay un hombre viejo que lo ha visto.

translation.en: Here's an old man who has seen, yes, he has seen!
translation.es: Aquí hay un hombre viejo que lo ha visto. ¡Sí, lo ha visto!

translation.en: And I want to save you, I want to walk with you
translation.es: Y quiero decirles… …quiero caminar con ustedes a los brazos de mi Padre.

translation.en: into my father's hands.
translation.es: …quiero caminar con ustedes a los brazos de mi Padre.

translation.en: Guys?
It's the only place they can be.
[Jessup] What?
[Ollie] Couldn't just disappear.
[Jessup] Look, I told you, okay? I don't know where they are and I don't...
translation.es: Ya les dije que no sé dónde están.

translation.en: I didn't think they'd do it.
translation.es: No pensé que lo harían. Dijeron que lo harían, pero yo…

translation.en: They said they would do it,
translation.es: Dijeron que lo harían, pero yo…

translation.en: and I told them what the MP said at the pharmacy,
translation.es: Dijeron que lo harían, pero yo… Les dije lo que el policía dijo en la farmacia…

translation.en: and they swore they'd do it,
I just didn't think they would.
Oh, Jesus.
It's the Arrowhead Project, isn't it?
This mist. It's some kind of what, military fuck up?
translation.es: La niebla… ¿qué es? ¿Un maldito error militar?

translation.en: What were you guys messing with up there, huh?
We got you now, you sorry son of a bitch!
Get in there!
It was them! It was them what done it to us!
It was them what brung down the final wrath upon us!
translation.es: ¡Fueron ellos quienes causaron la ira final!

translation.en: Those two peckerwoods that he's been with this whole time,
translation.es: Esos dos que estuvieron con él todo este tiempo.

translation.en: they hung themselves in the back because they knew, they knew it all along.
translation.es: Se ahorcaron porque sabían. ¡Lo supieron todo el tiempo!

translation.en: No, he's crazy. He doesn't know what he's-
Get on your knees! Stay out of it, Drayton.
They heard it too, didn't ya? All of ya!
All about the Arrowhead Project
and all that secret shit up on the mountain.
translation.es: …y esa cuestión secreta en la montaña.

translation.en: That's what brung it down on us.
translation.es: Eso es lo que sucedió aquí.

translation.en: That's what brung down the wrath of God.
translation.es: ¡Eso es lo que descargó la ira de Dios!

translation.en: Private Jessup.
It wasn't me.
translation.es: No fui yo. Sólo… sólo me apostaron allí. No soy el responsable…

translation.en: I'm stationed out there, I'm not responsible.
translation.es: Sólo… sólo me apostaron allí. No soy el responsable…

translation.en: Bullshit. Hell, I'm a local!
translation.es: - Mentira. - Demonios, yo soy de aquí.

translation.en: Most of you people know me.
translation.es: La mayoría de ustedes me conocen.

translation.en: You! Stop your chicken shit whining, or I will cut your puling tongue out.
translation.es: Acaba con tus malditas quejas o te cortaré la lengua.

translation.en: Now you tell us!
Tell us.
Look, look, okay, okay.
I heard stuff.
"Stuff".
Yes, we all heard stuff.
Like, how they thought that there were other dimensions.
translation.es: Como… que ellos creían en otras dimensiones…

translation.en: Other worlds all around us,
and how they wanted to try and make a window.
You know, so they could look through and see what's on the other side.
translation.es: …para poder ver que hay del otro lado.

translation.en: Well, maybe your window turned out to be a door,
translation.es: Tal vez tu ventana resultó ser una puerta, ¿no es así?

translation.en: Not mine, those scientists!
Oh, the scientists.
Yes, the scientists, it wasn't me.
translation.es: Los científicos. Claro, los científicos. Deben haber abierto un agujero accidentalmente.

translation.en: They must've ripped a hole open by accident,
translation.es: Deben haber abierto un agujero accidentalmente.

translation.en: this other world came spilling through to ours.
translation.es: Ese otro mundo se soltó dentro del nuestro.

translation.en: That's what Donaldson was saying to me right before he killed himself,
translation.es: Eso es lo que Donaldson me dijo antes de quitarse la vida.

translation.en: I didn't understand the half of it.
translation.es: No entendí la mitad de eso.

translation.en: It ain't my fault!
Ain't his fault.
Ain't nothing ever anybody's fault.
translation.es: Nunca nada es la culpa de nadie.

translation.en: But he denies it.
He points the finger.
This Judas in our midst.
Judas!
David!
You, you!
Don't you know by now?
Don't you know the truth?
We are being punished.
For what? For going against the will of God?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Por actuar contrario al deseo de Dios.

translation.en: For going against his forbidden rules of old.
translation.es: Por actuar contrario a sus antiguos dictámenes.

translation.en: Walking on the moon.
Yes, yes!
Or splitting his atoms.
Or stem cells and abortions!
translation.es: O… o las células madre y los abortos.

translation.en: And destroying the secrets of life
translation.es: Y destruir los secretos de la vida…

translation.en: that only God above has any right to!
translation.es: …cuando sólo Dios tiene el derecho de hacerlo.

translation.en: Amen! Amen!
Yes, I know. It is true!
And now we are being punished,
the judgment is being brought down upon us.
The fiends of hell, you see they are let loose.
translation.es: Los demonios del Infierno, ven que han sido liberados…

translation.en: And star Wormwood blazes.
And it is his fault, yes his-
No, no! It is not my fault!
They did it! They spit in the eye of the almighty!
No!
Get over there!
No!
Judas!
String him up!
[Man] Stand up, you coward!
Jesus!
No! Stop him!
Feed him to the beast!
Expiation!
Let the abominations smell his blood!
No!
Jesus, wait! David!
Please.
The beast will leave us alone tonight.
translation.es: La bestia no nos molestará esta noche.

translation.en: Tomorrow...
Tomorrow we'll just have to wait and see.
[Billy] Daddy?
Daddy?
I'm sorry I left you, pal.
I won't ever leave you again.
Promise?
You have to give me your best promise, okay?
translation.es: Debes hacerme tu mejor promesa, ¿está bien?

translation.en: Your very best promise. You can never break it.
translation.es: La mejor de todas. Y nunca podrás romperla.

translation.en: Tell me.
Promise you won't let the monsters get me.
translation.es: Promete que no dejarás que los monstruos me atrapen.

translation.en: Ever, no matter what.
I promise.
I love you, Daddy.
I love you, Billy.
More than anything.
It's dawn.
Hey, pal.
translation.es: Oye, ¿estás listo para ir a casa?

translation.en: You ready to go home?
translation.es: Oye, ¿estás listo para ir a casa? Vamos.

translation.en: Come on.
Okay. I've got the groceries hidden at check stand number 2.
translation.es: Bien, escondí las provisiones en el puesto de la caja 2.

translation.en: Five bags, we can grab 'em and get out the door.
translation.es: 5 bolsas. Podemos tomarlas e irnos de aquí.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.es: Bien. Mi auto está en el carril central del estacionamiento, al final.

translation.en: My car's parked in the center lane of the parking lot, far end.
translation.es: Mi auto está en el carril central del estacionamiento, al final.

translation.en: Whoever gets there first open up both doors,
translation.es: Quien llegue primero, abre las dos puertas…

translation.en: and we'll all pile in as fast as we can, okay?
translation.es: y el resto entra lo más rápido posible.

translation.en: Let's go.
Stealing food now?
Going out now, Mrs. Carmody.
Please stand aside.
You can't go out, I won't allow it.
translation.es: No pueden salir. No lo permitiré.

translation.en: Won't allow it?
It's against God's will.
translation.es: Va en contra de la voluntad de Dios.

translation.en: Don't you know that by now?
Haven't I proven myself again and again and again?
translation.es: ¿No he demostrado que tengo razón una y otra vez?

translation.en: Haven't I shown that I am his vessel?
translation.es: ¿No he demostrado que yo soy Su vehículo?

translation.en: What's the matter with you?
Don't you believe in God?
No one's interfered with you,
translation.es: Nadie ha interferido en sus cosas. Lo único que deseamos es el mismo privilegio.

translation.en: all we're asking for is the same privilege.
translation.es: Lo único que deseamos es el mismo privilegio.

translation.en: You heard him.
It is these people who brought this upon us.
translation.es: Son ellos los culpables de lo que ocurre.

translation.en: They, people who refuse to bend to the will of God
translation.es: Ellos, los que se niegan a someterse a la voluntad de Dios…

translation.en: and claim it privilege.
Sinners in pride.
Yes, haughty.
